Terms of Service

Legal terms and conditions for using our services

Last updated: January 2025

Agreement to Terms

By accessing and using the NosytLabs website (nosytlabs.com) and our services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

Definitions

  • "Company" (referred to as "we," "us," or "our") refers to NosytLabs
  • "Service" refers to the website, applications, and services provided by NosytLabs
  • "User" (referred to as "you" or "your") refers to any individual accessing our services
  • "Content" refers to all text, images, code, videos, and other materials on our website

Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily access and use the materials on NosytLabs' website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

  • Modify or copy the materials
  • Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
  • Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
  • Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
  • Use automated systems to access or scrape our content

This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by us at any time.

Our Services

Web Development Services

  • Custom website development and design
  • Consultation on development tools and practices
  • Code review and optimization recommendations
  • Learning-focused development projects

Content Creation

  • Educational content about web development
  • Technology reviews and tutorials
  • Live streaming and video content
  • Blog posts and technical articles

Service Limitations

Our services are currently focused on learning projects and small to medium-scale development work. We reserve the right to decline projects that are outside our current capabilities or capacity.

User Responsibilities

When using our services, you agree to:

  • Provide accurate and complete information when requested
  • Use our services only for lawful purposes
  • Respect intellectual property rights
  • Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
  • Not use our services to transmit harmful or malicious content
  • Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
  • Maintain the confidentiality of any login credentials

Intellectual Property Rights

Our Content

The materials on NosytLabs' website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, video clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, are the property of NosytLabs or its content suppliers and are protected by copyright laws.

Open Source Projects

Some of our projects are open source and available on GitHub under specific licenses. These projects are governed by their respective open source licenses, which may grant you additional rights to use, modify, and distribute the code.

Client Work

For custom development work, intellectual property rights will be clearly defined in individual project agreements. Generally, clients retain rights to their specific project deliverables, while we retain rights to general methodologies and reusable components.

Payment Terms

  • Payment terms will be specified in individual project agreements
  • We typically require a deposit before beginning work
  • Final payment is due upon project completion and delivery
  • Late payments may incur additional fees
  • Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis
  • All prices are subject to applicable taxes

Disclaimers

Service Availability

We strive to maintain high availability of our website and services, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. Services may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, updates, or technical issues.

Accuracy of Information

While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we make no representations or warranties about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website.

Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over the content and nature of these sites and are not responsible for their content or privacy practices.

Limitation of Liability

In no event shall NosytLabs or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on NosytLabs' website, even if NosytLabs or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

Our total liability for any claim arising out of or relating to these terms or our services shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific service giving rise to the claim.

Termination

We may terminate or suspend your access to our services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately. All provisions of the Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination.

Governing Law

These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which NosytLabs operates, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that state or location.

Changes to Terms

We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

Your continued use of our services after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
